headline: NiSource to Release Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Host Conference Call on October 29
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., October 15, 2025--NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI) today announced that the company will release its third quarter 2025 financial results on Oct. 29 before U.S. financial markets open and will host a conference call that day at 11 a.m. EDT (10 a.m. CT) to review the third quarter 2025 financial results and provide a general business update. All interested parties may listen to the conference call live on Oct. 29 by logging onto the NiSource website at www.nisource.com. A link on the
